name: mezzio/mezzio
description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

suggest.aura/router: ^2.3 to use the Aura.Router routing adapter
suggest.filp/whoops: ^1.1 to use the Whoops error handler
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc: ^2.5 to use the laminas-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.laminas/laminas-psr7bridge: ^0.1.0 to use the laminas-mvc TreeRouteStack routing adapter
suggest.laminas/laminas-servicemanager: ^2.5 to use laminas-servicemanager for dependency injection
suggest.laminas/laminas-view: ^2.5 to use the laminas-view template adapter
suggest.league/plates: ^3.1 to use the Plates template adapter
suggest.mouf/pimple-interop: ^1.0 to use Pimple for dependency injection
suggest.nikic/fast-route: ^0.6.0 to use the FastRoute routing adapter
suggest.twig/twig: ^1.19 to use the Twig template adapter
